description: A combination of a use of hard-coded cryptographic key vulnerability [CWE-321] in FortiClientEMS 7.0.1 and below, 6.4.6 and below and an improper certificate validation vulnerability [CWE-297] in FortiClientWindows, FortiClientLinux and FortiClientMac 7.0.1 and below, 6.4.6 and below may allow an unauthenticated and network adjacent attacker to perform a man-in-the-middle attack between the EMS and the FCT via the telemetry protocol.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: FortiClientEMS 7.0.1 and below,  6.4.6 and below, FortiClientWindows, FortiClientLinux, FortiClientMac 7.0.1 and below,  6.4.6 and below.
